name: Flash

related.name: Cookies
related.preview: Cookies are small files which are stored on your computer. They are used to hold data specific to a particular browser and website, and can be accessed either by the web server or your computer. They

text:
Flash is a multimedia playback software owned by Adobe, used for producing rich multimedia content such a videos, games, and websites all in your browser.

Update

To update Flash, please follow the latest instructions from adobe here

Settings

Chrome

To quickly adjust your Flash settings:

  1. Click the Lock Icon within the address bar
  2. Go to Site settings
  3. Look for Flash
  4. Adjust the settings to your preference
